title.rendered: Homeschool Room Now OPEN! + Kid’s Corner

content.rendered:
The Homeschool Room is OPEN!

Our homeschool room is now open at the Peach Shops of Byron location. We have consolidated our homeschool books to the Byron store, so it’s now a one-stop shop! We will continue to add inventory and polishing touches over the next couple of weeks. The books in the homeschool room have a special pricing system:

Kid’s Corner Week 1

We had a fun reader and an amazing group of kids. Join us next week in Warner Robins for guest reader Mayor Randy Toms!

Kid’s Corner Schedule
